discourse_list.title: EIP-2031 Net transaction counter (change B from State Rent v3 proposal)

content.content: Ethereum Improvement Proposals   State Rent B - Net transaction counter Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs) describe standards for the Ethereum platform, including core protocol specifications, client APIs, and contract standards.
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of a proposal for the Ethereum platform, specifically regarding the State Rent B - Net transaction counter. It falls under the category of the author explaining their proposal and could be of interest to those auditing and reviewing the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
